about_the_game:
The dark carnival has returned to Boot Hill. The maniacal Doc Ketchum is streaming his Murder Circus to the masses. Violence has gone viral … and you want your cut!

Play as one of four contestants in a challenging new solo battle of skill, perseverance and brutality. Level-up your skills and weapons. Survive increasingly tougher encounters. Vanquish your ultimate rival, and take your hard-fought winnings back into the Saints Row campaign!

This pack includes:

• Murder Circus mode
• Darkshot rifle
• Harlech LMG
• Bulldog dual shotguns
• Molotov skill
• 39 cosmetics & collectibles

content_descriptors.notes: Saints Row contatins frequent violence with blood effects and portrays the rise of a criminal gang in a realistic modern day America. Frequent cursing, crude humor and sexual innuendos are present throughout the dialogue. The character editor allows the player to be naked including censored genitalia and uncovered breasts.
